title: Start
body:
You've defeated the enemies and brought me their remains. Well done.
[[ You need to bring me a harder challenge. |Yes1]] 
[[ Felt good to be a real mage. |Alt1]]

title: Yes1
body:
There will be a more difficult challenge ahead.
[[ Bring it to me, now!! |Yes11]] 
[[ Where is the easy mode? |Yes11]]

title: Alt1
body:
Then prepare to use those skills against your ultimate test. 
[[ I was born ready. |Yes11]] 
[[ Exciting. |Yes11]]

title: Yes2
body: Enter the portal ahead, and prepare for the true, ultimate test of your abilities.

title: Yes11
body:
Take this potion, full of a regenerative substance. Press the [R] Key to consume it and heal yourself of any damage.
[[ Sounds OP... |Yes2]] 
[[ Sounds incredibly useful. I'll take it. |Yes2]]
